articles.author: Anna Adams
articles.title: Four-star WR Donovan Murph commits to South Carolina over Clemson at Under Armour All-America Game - 247Sports
articles.description: South Carolina kicked off the new year by landing prized instate wide receiver recruit Donovan Murph in a headtohead battle with Clemson at the Under Armour AllAmerica Game
articles.content: During pregame of the Under Armour All-America Game Thursday afternoon, four-star senior wide receiver Donovan Murph of Irmo (S.C.) High announced his South Carolina commitment. The 6-foot-2, 190 pou… [+4349 chars]
